code: import UserActionTypes from"./user.types";export var setCurrentUser=function setCurrentUser(user){return{type:UserActionTypes.SET_CURRENT_USER,payload:user};};export var signInWithGoogleStart=function signInWithGoogleStart(){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_IN_WITH_GOOGLE_START};};export var signInSuccess=function signInSuccess(user){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_IN_SUCCESS,payload:user};};export var signInFailure=function signInFailure(error){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_IN_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var signInWithEmailStart=function signInWithEmailStart(emailAndPassword){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_IN_WITH_EMAIL_START,payload:emailAndPassword};};export var checkCurrentUser=function checkCurrentUser(){return{type:UserActionTypes.CHECK_CURRENT_USER};};export var signOutStart=function signOutStart(cartItems){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_OUT_START,payload:cartItems};};export var signOutSuccess=function signOutSuccess(){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_OUT_SUCCESS};};export var signOutFailure=function signOutFailure(error){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_OUT_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var signUpStart=function signUpStart(credentials){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_UP_START,payload:credentials};};export var signUpSuccess=function signUpSuccess(_ref){var user=_ref.user,additionalData=_ref.additionalData;return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_UP_SUCCESS,payload:{user:user,additionalData:additionalData}};};export var signUpFailure=function signUpFailure(){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGN_UP_FAILURE};};
